summary: Completed frontend testing of Rally Dashboard - Scene 3 Leaderboard and Stream Setup Tab features. All requested features are working correctly.

code_quality.issue: 8 ESLint warnings about calling setState within useEffect (react-hooks/set-state-in-effect)
code_quality.note: Not a functional bug, but a React best practice violation that could cause cascading renders

passed_tests: Scene 3 Leaderboard: Component renders correctly with Overall Standings view
Scene 3 Leaderboard: Stage selector dropdown shows only SS stages (excludes non-SS like Shakedown, Service Park)
Scene 3 Leaderboard: When selecting SS2, overall time = sum of SS1 + SS2 times (verified: 5:23.456 + 8:12.789 = 13:36.245)
Scene 3 Leaderboard: Running time shown in YELLOW (#FACC15) when pilot is racing
Scene 3 Leaderboard: Overall time includes running time for racing pilots (SS1 time + current running time)
Scene 3 Leaderboard: Pilots without SS time for selected stage show '-' for SS TIME
Stream Setup Tab: Tab appears in Setup page navigation
Stream Setup Tab: Shows stream config cards only for pilots with stream URLs (3 cards for 3 pilots with URLs)
Stream Setup Tab: Volume slider displays and persists values (tested 100%, 80%)
Stream Setup Tab: Solo button toggles solo mode with yellow ring indicator
Stream Setup Tab: Mute button toggles mute with red icon indicator
Stream Setup Tab: Video adjustment sliders present (Saturation, Contrast, Brightness)
Stream Setup Tab: Reset to Defaults button resets all values to 100%
Stream Setup Tab: Category color bars displayed on cards
Stream configs persist to localStorage (rally_stream_configs key)
StreamPlayer component applies CSS filters for saturation/contrast/brightness
StreamPlayer component handles solo mode (mutes all others when one is solo'd)
StreamPlayer component adds muted/volume params to VDO.Ninja URL
critical_code_review_comments: RallyContext.jsx: Consider refactoring updateDataVersion() calls to avoid setState within useEffect - use a ref or combine with localStorage.setItem in a single operation
seed_data_creation: Test data created via localStorage with 4 pilots (3 with stream URLs), 2 categories, 5 stages (3 SS type), times for SS1 and SS2
context_for_next_testing_agent: All requested features for Scene 3 Leaderboard and Stream Setup Tab are working correctly. The overall time calculation correctly sums SS times up to the selected stage, and running times are displayed in yellow. Stream configs persist to localStorage and are applied to StreamPlayer components.

scene3_leaderboard_overall_time_calculat.details: When SS2 is selected, overall time = SS1 time + SS2 time. Verified: Sebastien Ogier 5:23.456 + 8:12.789 = 13:36.245

scene3_leaderboard_running_time_yellow.details: Kalle Rovanpera's time displayed in yellow (#FACC15) while racing SS2

stream_setup_tab_ui.details: All UI elements present: volume slider, solo button, mute button, saturation/contrast/brightness sliders, reset button

stream_config_persistence.details: Stream configs saved to localStorage under 'rally_stream_configs' key

stream_player_config_application.details: StreamPlayer applies CSS filters and URL params for volume/mute
